content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Processing Facility at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-15.0, y=-50.0) with a drop position at (x=-14.5, y=-48.5)
- Iron Chest at position (x=-18.5, y=-48.5) containing iron ore
- Iron Chest at position (x=-16.5, y=-48.5) containing iron ore
- Iron Chest at position (x=-15.5, y=-48.5) empty
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-14.5, y=-48.5) containing iron ore
- Iron Chest at position (x=-13.5, y=-49.5) empty
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-13.0, y=-48.0) processing iron ore into iron plates
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-12.5, y=-49.5) empty
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-11.0, y=-48.0) processing iron ore into iron plates
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-9.5, y=-49.5) empty
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-9.0, y=-48.0) processing iron ore into iron plates
- Iron Chest at position (x=-14.5, y=-47.5) empty

### Coal and Iron Plate Processing Facility at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=41.0, y=-82.0) with a drop position at (x=41.5, y=-80.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (x=43.0, y=-82.0) processing materials
- Iron Chest at position (x=41.5, y=-80.5) containing coal
- Burner Inserter at position (x=43.5, y=-80.5) transferring items
- Iron Chest at position (x=42.5, y=-80.5) containing iron plates
- Burner Inserter at position (x=43.5, y=-80.5) transferring items
- Iron Chest at position (x=45.5, y=-80.5) containing coal and iron plates
- Iron Chest at position (x=44.5, y=-80.5) containing coal and iron plates
- Iron Chest at position (x=47.5, y=-80.5) containing coal and iron plates
- Iron Chest at position (x=49.5, y=-80.5) containing coal
- Wooden Chest at position (x=41.5, y=-79.5) containing coal
- Burner Inserter at position (x=41.5, y=-78.5) waiting for source items

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting from mining drills
- Ensure that the output of the mining drill is not blocked. Clear the chest at the drop position to continue mining.

### Errors when supplying iron ore to furnaces
- Verify that you have iron ore in your inventory before attempting to supply it to furnaces.

### Errors when placing storage chests
- Check that the target location is clear of any existing objects before placing a new storage chest.

### Errors when transferring iron ore
- Confirm the presence of the target entity at the specified position before attempting to transfer iron ore.
